New Domain

04 May 2021

I am excited to report that my new domain, fsj.ai is live. In the effort of having an incomprehensibly short domain name, I elected for the ccTLD .ai and just my initials. It was remarkably difficult to secure a domain name that I felt excited about, but I am very happy with this one. My old domain (finnjames.dev) redirects to this site, now.

I do think it is easy to get obsessed with acquiring the perfect domain name. I went through a lot of different options before settling on this one. I canâ€™t say it was my very first choice, but as it turns out, finn.com has been taken since the 90s.

I have also set up an email account for this domain. Try it out by emailing me at hey @ this domain!
